cookieBanner.heading: Cookies on Send your fit note for your ESA claim
cookieBanner.essentialCookies: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookieBanner.analyticsCookies: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.
cookieBanner.acceptedHtml: You’ve accepted additional cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.
